#labels Featured,Phase-Requirements
= System Requirements =

The programs are designed for Unix-likes operating systems. It requires the [http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net/bowtie2/index.shtml Bowtie2] program installed and included into the user {{{$PATH}}} environment variable.

The GNU GCC compiler is required for compile the source code.

The Graphical interface is javascript based web site developed using [http://angularjs.org/ AngularJS] and running over a [http://nodejs.org/ Nodes.JS] server.
